ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Ching,Clarence Lansang,Sonia Im,Brian Ching,Clarence Lansang,Sonia Im
ComicInfo.Summary:
Vladimir meets with Voivodul, after having council with Enoch, who grants him with an unbreakable bond and offers him total dominion over mankind in exchange for his help to regain power over the Dayaks and the Mineans.....
Also, previews the Making of Ascension 2
